review.title: “I earn my paycheck”
review.pros: Pros – You can learn a lot , they promote employees from within the company, many people have been with them for years ( decades)
review.cons: Cons – There is an excessive amount of backstabbing, some crass individuals and way too much politics.Some policies seem backwards, inefficient & create more work.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Realize that some of your employees are very dishonest, yet are rewarded. They frame others and try to protect themselves.
